name: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check boundary values of EVENT COUNT
id: stories/widgets/EventDiscoveryWidget.story;(/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check boundary values of EVENT COUNT

testSteps.description: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check boundary values of EVENT COUNT #1: {value=0, actualValue=1}

children.description: Given open Event Discovery Widget page
Open page
When set Event Count {0} on Event Discovery Widget page
Set event count value: 0
Then the number of events equals Event Count {1}
Check that number of events equals value: 1

children.description: Given open Event Discovery Widget page
Open page
When set Event Count {1} on Event Discovery Widget page
Set event count value: 1
Then the number of events equals Event Count {1}
Check that number of events equals value: 1

userStory.narrative:
In order to setup Event Discovery Widget
As a user of Ticketmaster Developer Portal
I want to use the widget configurator to customize the layout of the widget,
and have ability to grab a small code snippet to insert into 3-rd party websites
